original_text: Then Abraham prayed to God. As a result, God made Abimelech become well again. He also made Abimelech's wife and his female slaves become well, so that they could have children again.
korean_text: 아브라함이 하나님께 기도하매 하나님이 아비멜렉과 그의 아내와 여종을 치료하사 출산하게 하셨으니

sentences.original_text: As a result, God made Abimelech become well again
sentences.korean_translation: 그 결과, 하나님께서 아비멜렉이 다시 건강하게 되게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: He also made Abimelech's wife become well
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서는 또한 아비멜렉의 아내를 건강하게 하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and his female slaves become well
so that they could have children again
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 다시 자녀를 가질 수 있도록 하셨습니다
